text: Kelly E. Hastings (born June 16, 1961) is an American politician. == Education == In 1986, Hastings earned a BS in Communication, Marketing, Management from Appalachian State University. Hastings earned a graduate teaching certificate from University of North Carolina at Charlotte. == Career == Hastings served in U.S. Marine Corps and Reserve. In 1997, Hastings became a realtor. In 2010, Hastings' political career began as a Republican member of the North Carolina General Assembly for the 110th district. On November 6, 2018, Hastings won the general election as the North Carolina House of Representatives, District 110. Hastings is serving his 5th term. == Personal life == Hastings' wife is Anika, a dentist. They have one child. Hastings resides in Cherryville, North Carolina. == See also == * John Porter East * North Carolina General Assembly ==References== == External links == * Kelly Hastings at gastongop.org * kellyhastings.com * Kelly Hastings at powervoter.us Category:Living people Category:North Carolina Republicans Category:21st-century American politicians Category:1961 births
title: Kelly Hastings
